parameters.name: aggregatePagination
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable aggregation. If you enable this feature, the CLI automatically reads full data by page and aggregates the results.

><warning>

Only List operations that support paging can use this switch.

></warning>

- true: enables aggregation.

- false: disables aggregation.

parameters.name: jsonApiParams
parameters.description: The request parameters for the API in JSON format. This parameter has a lower priority than \`apiParams\`. If \`apiParams\` is set, this parameter is ignored.

parameters.name: product
parameters.description:
The product code.

- Call the GetRequestLog operation to obtain the product code from the response.

- Find the product code in the URL of the product in OpenAPI Portal. For example, <props="china">the OpenAPI Portal URL for Short Message Service is https\://api.aliyun.com/product/Dysmsapi. The product code for Short Message Service is Dysmsapi.</props>
  <props="intl">the OpenAPI Portal URL for Short Message Service is https\://api.alibabacloud.com/product/Dysmsapi. The product code for Short Message Service is Dysmsapi.</props>
